logger.doc:name: Log Outbound
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { flowName: flow.name, apiName: app.name, Name: "Log Outbound", MetaData: "Request to Sf system api", correlationId: correlationId, data: payload }]

logger.doc:name: Log Inbound
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { flowName: flow.name, apiName: app.name, Name: "Log Inbound", MetaData: "Request to Sf system api completed", correlationId: correlationId, data: payload }]
